Welcome Mark!
News Update

March 29, 2020

Public health orders: March 29 update

Starting March 29 at 11:59 p.m., the provincial health officer is strengthning province-wide restrictions. Restaurants, pubs, and bars are closed for indoor dining. Outdoor patio seating and take-out or delivery is allowed. Employers are advised to review and comply with these requirements.

Find out more here

*** Risk Advisory ***

November 2, 2020

New risk advisory outlines the risks of outdoor heaters in enclosed patio spaces

Using an outdoor heater in an enlcosed space can put your workers at risk of exposure to carbon monoxide. As an employer, it's important you know how to minimize this risk to your workers and customers.

Find out more here
